text:
3 thoughts on hearing this news:
1, pls do heed advice & stay away.
2, good to see designed spill way working.
3, sad to hear of other problems.
@EnvAgencyNW will urgently look, with @Lancswildlife, for options to repair once river levels fall. https://t.co/Ihi9dqRIqp
